modifier.tinkertantrum.quarky.descriptio: Increases Damage a little for each Item on your hotbar from a mod by Vazkii, scaled to the stack's Size out of its maximum.
modifier.tinkertantrum.overcharging.desc: Builds up Overslime on equipped Armor as you deal Damage.
modifier.tinkertantrum.ferromagnetic.des: This item is Ferromagnetic, and can be manipulated by Magnetic forces.
